drills.name: Long Run
drills.description: 30 minutes at the fastest pace you can run (Track the distance)

drills.name: 100's
drills.description: 100's each in 1 minute (20 seconds for the 100yd sprint, and 40 seconds recovery to jog back) This should take a total of 10 consecutive minutes

drills.name: Speed Training
drills.description: 60 yard sprints with 20 seconds rest in between each 1 minute rest

drills.name: Speed Training
drills.description: 40 yard sprints with 15 seconds rest in between each 1 minute rest

drills.name: Speed Training
drills.description: 20 yard sprints with 10 seconds rest in between each 2 minute rest

drills.name: Speed Training
drills.description: 5/10/15 shuttles with 15 seconds rest in between each Sprint out 5, back 5, out 10, back 10, out 15, back 15 for a total of 60 yards

drills.name: 150's
drills.description: 150's with 1 minute rest in between each 25 yards up and back 3 times

drills.name: Half-miles
drills.description: Half-miles in 3:30 with 3 min rest in between each
